resources.string: Billy is a hedgehog who lives in the woods and finds it difficult to control his tines, sometimes distracted and unwittingly annoys others.
While camping with his friends, Billy always ended up in trouble by his spikes. Causing chaos and uproar.
In the afternoon Billy plays soccer, until he hits the ball with his head and ends up breaking it, causing the anger of his friends.
At the end of the day Billy is left without friends, for all the problems that he has caused because of his spikes.
Her Best Friend the giraffe approaches and tells her that all animals have their qualities and that their tines make it special.
Billy takes advice from his friend and decides to be more careful with his spikes, combing them back. Since he does not want to run out of friends.
Billy does not want to be alone and decides to follow his friends from afar, who are going to play a part away from the forest.
"Suddenly a lion appears, Billy's friends hide behind him. Billy realizes it's time to use his tines to protect his friends."
"The lion is gone, and Billy's friends come to thank him, for Billy has learned to control his tines and now everyone admires him for his courage."
